articles.author: Jamie Woodhouse
articles.title: Charles Leclerc 'shocked and disappointed' by Lewis Hamilton Ferrari deal - report - Planet F1
articles.description: Charles Leclerc was said to be aware and welcoming of Lewis Hamilton to Ferrari, but it seems not...
articles.content:
Charles Leclerc was said to be in the know and welcoming of Lewis Hamilton to Ferrari talks, but a fresh report in the Italian press claims this is not the case.
Leclerc will have a new Ferrari team… [+2642 chars]
